title: BBC Local Live: Beds, Herts & Bucks on Friday, 8 January 2016 - BBC News
summary: a 13-year-old who was punched by a fellow pupil at kings langley school in hertfordshire is in a critical condition .
pupils at a st albans school have been speaking to british astronaut tim peake in space this morning .
news . sport , travel and weather updates resume at 08:00 on monday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's all from us this week folks .
join us again from 08:00 on monday for all the latest news , sport , weather and travel for beds , herts and bucks .

documents.title: latest headlines : train fire in bucks reading festival death
text: the stories we 're looking at :
author: Jane Killick
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: minor injuries treatment suspended at watford general hospital
text: west herts hospitals nhs trust has taken the decision to stop treating adults with minor ailments at watford hospital due to the accident and emergency department `` experiencing an extreme unprecedented surge of very sick patients . ''
the trust has confirmed treatment for minor injuries will be suspended for the next 24 hours .
children 's services are unaffected .
west herts hospitals
westhertsnhs
if you 're coughing and sneezing , please seek advice from your local pharmacy # nhs
if you 're coughing and sneezing , please seek advice from your local pharmacy # nhs

documents.title: tim peake : 'great ' to speak to st albans pupils , says astronaut
text: british astronaut tim peake has tweeted it was `` great '' to speak to st albans school pupils this morning as the international space station passed over the uk .
the amateur radio call made history as the first of it 's kind from the uk to a british astronaut on the space station .

author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: hatton garden raid : herts man had 'no skill to offer , ' court hears
text: a hertfordshire man accused of being part of the hatton garden raid could not be guilty because he had no skill to offer to the criminal gang , according to his defence lawyer .
nick corsellis told woolwich crown court that carl wood ( left ) , 58 , of elderbeck close , cheshunt , had nothing to bring to the table .
he asked the jury if they thought criminals would give a share of their millions to a man who was simply an `` extra pair of hands '' .
mr wood denies conspiracy to commit burglary and another related charge .
author: Jane Killick
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: jack garratt 'ca n't quite believe ' he 's won bbc sound of 2016
text: experimental songwriter jack garratt , from buckinghamshire , `` ca n't quite believe '' he has topped the bbc 's sound of 2016 list , which highlights the most exciting new artists in music .
the singer says he 's `` unbelievably , overwhelmingly grateful '' for the honour , and is `` still waiting for someone to turn around and go , 'no , kidding .
that was a joke - give it back ' . ''
author: BBC Introducing... in Beds, Herts and Bucks

documents.title: weather : showers possible tonight and tomorrow
text: tonight : small chance of a shower , but mostly dry with some clear spells .
lows of around 3-5c ( upper 30sf ) .
tomorrow : a few brighter spells , but rather cloudy with scattered showers .
highs of 8-9c ( upper 40s f ) .
author: Chris Bell
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: drug raids in high wycombe lead to six arrests
text: northamptonshire police have carried out two drugs raids in high wycombe .
both class a and class b drugs were seized in laburnum road and plumer road .
three men , two women and a 17-year-old , all from high wycombe , were arrested .

documents.title: reading festival death : teenager had rare disorder
text: the death of a teenager from bedfordshire who fell ill at reading festival was due to natural causes , an inquest has concluded .
esme blore-rimmer , 17 , from stevington , was taken to royal berkshire hospital in august 2013 when she became unwell .
staff diagnosed her with gastroenteritis and she was discharged the same day .
the inquest heard esme continued to be ill and the following day was taken to northampton hospital where she died .
post-mortem tests revealed her death was due to mcadd - a disorder affecting one in 10,000 people .

documents.title: bucks ' jack garratt 's compliments from the stars
text: in case you missed it , buckinghamshire 's jack garratt has come top of the list for the bbc music sound of 2016 .
it must feel pretty good to get props like this from huge artists

documents.title: luton town manager wants players to 'wear badge with pride '
text: new luton town manager nathan jones has spoken to the media for the first time today .
jones said he has his own football philosophy , but wants to win matches - and for his players to wear the hatters ' badge with pride .
author: Luke Ashmead
BBC Three Counties Radio sport

documents.title: bus driver who interrupted cranfield remembrance service back at work
text: a bus driver who 'honked ' his horn and tried to drive through a remembrance day parade has been reinstated .
author: Bedfordshire on Sunday

documents.title: bafta nominations for elstree produced the danish girl
text: eddie redmayne is aiming for a bafta double after being nominated for best actor for the danish girl , which was filmed at elstree studios in hertfordshire .
the danish girl , in which redmayne plays transgender pioneer lili elbe , is named on the shortlist for outstanding british film .
alicia vikander is on the best actress list for her role in the film .
delighted that # thedanishgirl made at @ twitterid has five # baftanominations inc best actor for # eddieredmayne .
@ twitterid @ twitterid hiya morris - do you mind if we feature your tweet on the bbc website in a short piece about this please ?
@ twitterid @ twitterid of course you can .
@ twitterid @ twitterid brill , thank you : )
@ twitterid @ twitterid fit !
author: BBC Entertainment and Arts

documents.title: chiltern railways suspended after train fire
text: there is no service on chiltern railways due to a fire in the engine of a train at saunderton .
buckinghamshire fire and rescue service was called to the bradenham road bridge near princes risborough just after 14:00 .
six crews attended the incident but no one was injured .
two from the scene of this afternoon 's train fire near # highwycombe

documents.title: afternoon headlines : luton terror accused in court schoolboy critically ill after attack
text: the top stories :
author: Jane Killick
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: missing poster for milton keynes singing frog statue
text: we reported on monday that a singing frog statue had gone missing from a park in milton keynes - well , it 's still awol and the parks trust has issued a missing poster .
the four-piece frog band , now reduced to a trio , resides in howe park wood near tattenhoe in milton keynes .
the parks trust , which manages the area , says it has reported the missing statue to police and that it was last seen on 30 december .
please help us .
the other band members are in need of their singer !
please rt # froggatemk
@ twitterid hiya , is it okay for us to feature this poster on the bbc website and social media please ?
@ twitterid sure that 's ok
@ twitterid hiya - can we use the poster as well for a story online please ?
@ twitterid sure
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : road and railway closed in buckinghamshire due to train fire
text: the a4010 bradenham road is closed in both directions due to a train fire on the nearby rail line between the a40 and bradenham wood lane .
chiltern railways are suspended between princes risborough and high wycombe as a result of the fire .
in hertfordshire , on the a1 , one lane is closed due to a three-car collision at j6 .
congestion back to j5 .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: four in court accused of encouraging support for is
text: four men from luton have appeared at the old bailey accused of encouraging support for the so-called islamic state .
mohammed istiak alamgir , 36 , yousaf bashir , 35 , and rajib khan , 37 , allegedly gave speeches supporting the terrorist group .
ziaur rahman , 38 , along with mr khan , is accused of organising the meetings where the speeches took place .
a trial date has provisionally been set for september .
author: Lee Agnew
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: weather watchers : weather where you are
text: what 's the weather like where you are ?
if you become one of our bbc weather watchers , you can take photos and temperature readings to keep us up-to-date on the website .
just like user boz has done with this photograph of the sunset across sandy in bedfordshire yesterday .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: astronaut radio call 'amazing ' , says st albans pupil
text: the st albans school pupil who led the discussion between sandringham school pupils and british astronaut tim peake says it was an `` amazing experience '' .
pupil jessica passed her radio exams , which should have taken a couple of weeks , in just a few days for the occasion .
her headmaster , alan gray , said it had been an extraordinary opportunity for the school and was a `` way of inspiring young people into science and technology '' .

documents.title: bedford schoolgirl followed by man in balaclava
text: a girl was followed to school in bedford by a man wearing a balaclava yesterday , in what police are describing as a `` worrying incident '' .
the girl was walking in an alleyway sometime between 07:40 and 08:00 from kimble drive to aylesbury road when the man started following her .
she managed to get away on her bicycle .

documents.title: little chalfont 's jack garratt reacts to news he 's topped sound of 2016 list
text: buckinghamshire 's jack garratt reacts to the news that he 's topped the bbc music sound of 2016 list .
we think he may have been a bit dizzy by the end of this video

documents.title: three vehicles stuck in same ford for over 24 hours
text: three vehicles have become stuck in the same buckinghamshire ford in the past 24 hours .
buckinghamshire fire and rescue said a car and its driver got caught in about two feet of water in the ford in hawkswood lane , fulmer on thursday .
when they arrived it was being recovered by a 4x4 , while another 4x4 was rescuing a delivery van .
at about 09:15 this morning , a man , a woman and two boys were in a car which suffered the same fate .
author: Katy Lewis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: mk dons re-sign brighton & hove albion 's jake forster-caskey
text: mk dons have re-signed brighton & hove albion midfielder jake forster-caskey on loan for the rest of the season .
the 21-year-old , who has appeared 82 times for brighton , played five games on loan at karl robinson 's championship strugglers earlier this campaign .
the england under-21 international is eligible for saturday 's fa cup third-round match against northampton town .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: weather : showers in the east later
text: a band of showers will push eastwards across stevenage and the rest of the area during the afternoon , but there will still be some dry weather with sunny spells .
maximum temperature : 9c ( 48f ) .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: pupils make radio call to tim peake
text: sandringham school in st albans has made history by making the first amateur radio call from the uk to a british astronaut on the space station .
the children contacted major tim peake as he flew overhead this morning .

it took a few minutes for the crackle and hiss to die down and allow the students to put some questions to the astronaut before the international space station disappeared over the horizon and out of range .

documents.title: wycombe name 46-year-old on bench for fa cup game
text: wycombe have named 46-year-old goalkeeping coach barry richardson on the bench for their fa cup third round tie against aston villa .
matt ingram 's red card against morecambe on saturday means he is suspended for the match , allowing a start for 20-year-old alex lynch .
richardson last played a professional game for doncaster in 2008 .
`` we 've got no one else we can put in there , '' said boss gareth ainsworth .
`` that 's wycombe , you get your chances . ''
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: lunchtime headlines : man 's body found on m1 herts schoolboy critical
text: the stories we 're looking at this lunchtime :
author: Jane Killick
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: hertfordshire hotel death : murder accused in court
text: a hertfordshire man has appeared before a crown court judge today accused of murdering a young teacher whose body was found in a hotel on christmas eve .
carl langdell , 26 , of roundmoor drive , cheshunt , is accused of killing teacher katie locke , 23 , at theobalds park hotel in waltham cross .
mr langdell made a brief appearance via a video link from bedford prison .
no plea was taken .
the case was adjourned until march .
author: Simon Oxley
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: m1 collision in the early hours
text: a car and a lorry were involved in a collision on the m1 near j10 in the early hours of this morning .
firefighters were called to the scene at 03:30 .
they said no one was trapped .
this person was very fortunate - this used to be their windscreen.please be careful in these colder night conditions
@ twitterid @ twitterid do you mind if we use this pic in the welwyn hatfield times online pls ?
credit to redbourn fire crew ?
thanks
@ twitterid @ twitterid we 're happy for you to if control are !
@ twitterid @ twitterid thank you very much .
take it that 's alright @ twitterid ?

documents.title: man 's body found on m1 near newport pagnell
text: a man 's body has been found on the m1 northbound carriageway near newport pagnell .
police were called at 22:30 yesterday to reports of a body between j14-j15 .
the road was closed while investigations into the cause of death took place .
it seems the man was struck by more than one vehicle , but it 's not clear how he came to be on the carriageway , police say .
he has not yet been identified .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: how st albans pupils prepared to speak to astronaut tim peake
text: the big event happened at 08:47 this morning , but how did pupils of sandringham school in st albans prepare for their chat to british astronaut tim peake on the international space station ?
this is how school reporters kallum and sebastian reported on preparations for the event
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: kings langley school attack : student in critical condition was punched
text: the headteacher of kings langley school in hertfordshire says their thoughts are with a student who remains in a critical condition after being attacked on the premises on wednesday .
an altercation occurred between two year nine boys at the end of school on the afternoon of 6 january 2016 and no one else was involved , '' headteacher gary lewis said .
`` the incident resulted in one of the students being punched . ''
`` unfortunately , this student is now being treated in hospital for a head injury and his condition is currently causing serious concern , '' he added .

documents.title: teenager critical after attack at kings langley school
text: a 13-year-old boy is in a critical condition with a serious head injury after he was attacked at kings langley school .
the boy was assaulted at 15:30 on wednesday and remains in a london hospital in a critical but stable condition .
a 14-year-old boy has been arrested and released on bail until 31 january .
author: Dani Bailey
BBC Local Live

documents.title: usain bolt 's trainers stolen in st albans
text: a pair of usain bolt 's trainers , which had been bought at a charity auction , have been stolen in st albans .
the running shoes , signed by the olympic champion , were in a black frame along with a certificate of authenticity .
they were stolen from a grey bmw in watling street , close to marlborough school , on 21 december .
hertfordshire police say the new owner had paid a significant amount of money for the shoes and planned to display them at home .
author: Carol Abercrombie
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: will wycombe add to villa woes ?
text: when wycombe wanderers play aston villa at adams park on saturday it will be one of six ties that will see premier league sides face league one or league two opposition .
aston villa , managed by remi garde ( have n't won a league game since the opening day of the season and relegation at this stage looks more likely to happen than not .
chairboys boss gareth ainsworth told bbc three counties radio that villa are `` fragile in the premier league , without a shadow of a doubt '' .
can the chairboys cause an upset ?
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: buckinghamshire 's jack garratt wins sound of 2016 : his story so far
text: it was revealed today that jack garratt , from little chalfont in buckinghamshire , has topped the bbc music sound of 2016 list .
jack first uploaded his music to us in 2009 and , as they say , the rest is history
author: BBC Introducing... in Beds, Herts and Bucks

documents.title: keech patient thanks those who donated to his 'angel ' campaign
text: a man being cared for at keech hos in luton who 's raised enough money for them to employ another nurse for a year has thanked those who donated to his campaign .
tony jules , 63 , from sundon park , has terminal prostate cancer , but is spending his time fundraising .
he 's now reached his target of £ 40,000 .
`` thank you , from the bottom of my heart .
thank you so much .
on behalf of keech and the angels - the members of staff - who will benefit from this generosity of giving , '' tony said .

documents.title: morning headlines : st albans pupils link-up with astronaut aylesbury pc sacked
text: the top stories :
author: Simon Oxley
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: four released on bail after luton death
text: four people arrested following the death of a man in luton have been released on bail until march .
the man 's body was found at a house in crescent road on wednesday evening .
two men and two woman were arrested on sus of murder .
a post mortem examination will be held to establish how the man died .
author: Lee Agnew
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: jack garratt tops bbc sound of 2016 list
text: experimental songwriter jack garratt has topped the bbc 's sound of 2016 list , which highlights the most exciting new artists in music .
the singer , from little chalfont in buckinghamshire , said he was `` unbelievably , overwhelmingly grateful '' for the honour .
the list was compiled using tips from a panel of 144 djs , journalists , festival bookers , bloggers and critics .
author: Mark Savage
Music reporter

documents.title: wycombe wanderers manager 'getting tingly '
text: wycombe wanderers are aiming to cause a major upset on saturday as they host premier league strugglers aston villa in the third round of the fa cup .
it 's a lunchtime kick-off in front of the television cameras at adams park , and manager gareth ainsworth believes that `` on our day we are a match for anyone '' .
he said : `` it 's brilliant for the club behind the scenes and it 's brilliant for the boys on the pitch and i have to admit i 'm getting a little tingle as well . ''
author: Simon Oxley
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: odion ighalo : 'i 'm not going anywhere '
text: watford 's leading scorer odion ighalo has pledged his future to the hornets , following speculation he could leave in the january transfer window .
in an interview for bbc world service , the nigerian international says he 's not going anywhere , especially with so many new watford fans in africa .
he said : `` in nigeria a lot of people support watford now because of me .
no-one knew about watford , but now [ we are ] doing well in [ the ] premier league [ we have ] attracted more supporters . ''
author: BBC World Service

documents.title: tim peake : astronaut in live link-up with pupils
text: a school in st albans has been the first in the uk to use amateur radio equipment to link up with british astronaut tim peake in space this morning .
the link up between sandringham school and the international space station took place shortly before 09:00 .
headteacher alan gray said : `` it 's a way of inspiring people into science and technology , seeing the opportunities that might be available to them . ''
author: Katy Lewis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: radiocar points towards iss at st albans ' school
text: i 'm at sandringham school in st albans this morning where the hall is set up like a makeshift space station as pupils prepare to link up with british astronaut tim peake .
and as i was driving into the car park i actually saw the international space station in the distance .
author: Paul Scoins
BBC Three Counties Radio political reporter

documents.title: excitement builds at sandringham school over space link up
text: excitement is building at sandringham school in st albans as bbc news covers preparations to speak to tim peake live from the international space station .
author: Katy Lewis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : delays on a413 and m1
text: traffic is queuing in both directions on the a413 in hardwick around the lower road junction due to an earlier accident .
all lanes have been reopened but congestion remains .
there 's also heavier traffic than usual on the northbound m1 between j13 for bedford and j14 for the a509 for milton keynes .
get the latest updates from bbc travel .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: 'domestic violence ' policeman sacked
text: a thames valley police officer based in aylesbury has been sacked for domestic abuse allegedly carried out against two women .
pc simon rowett was dismissed without notice after a public misconduct hearing on thursday .
he was found to have used `` physical force '' on four occasions against two previous partners between 2004 and 2014 .
det ch insp matt stone said : `` it is deeply disappointing when our staff not only fail to challenge and deal with domestic abuse but actively undertake it . ''
author: Katy Lewis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: today 's weather : chilly start , mostly dry
text: after a cold bright start there will be some rain around midday before it clears again later .
maximum temperature : 9c ( 48f ) .
check the forecast for where you live here .
author: Elizabeth Rizzini
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: latest headlines : children prepare to talk to astronaut tim peake police officer sacked over domestic abuse
text: here are the top stories we 're looking at this morning :
author: Simon Oxley
BBC Three Counties Radio

documents.title: welcome to local live for beds , herts and bucks
text: good morning and welcome to today 's live page for the three counties , where we 'll bring you all the latest news , sport , weather and travel for the area from now until 18:00 .
if you 'd like to get in touch , you can email us here or send us a tweet .
author: Katy Lewis
BBC Local Live
